utm_source.name: Campaign Source
utm_source.description: Parameter to identify the source of your traffic such as: search engine, newsletter, or other referral

utm_medium.name: Campaign Medium
utm_medium.description: Parameter to identify the medium the link was used upon such as: email, CPC, or other method of sharing

utm_term.name: Campaign Term
utm_term.description: Parameter suggested for paid search to identify keywords for your ad

utm_content.name: Campaign Content
utm_content.description: Parameter for additional details for A/B testing and content-targeted ads

utm_campaign.name: Campaign Name
utm_campaign.description: Parameter to identify a specific product promotion or strategic campaign such as a spring sale or other
